idea-plugin.name: CMake simple highlighter
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin for CMake syntax highlight/navigation support.
- It provides syntax highlight and variables navigation/renaming (*see Notes) for IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio.
- Extend existed highlighting in CLion.

Vote! for new functionality (write it in Note) and support the developer Paypal.me/AChapialiou :
- variable's scope of visibility for navigation/renaming.
- variables navigation/renaming in CLion.
- ENV variables navigation/renaming.
- function's declaration and references navigation/renaming.
- Other ... (just write in Note your needs!)
